scripts.api-build: npm run swagger-gen -- -c ./src/service-wrappers/account/tsoa.json && npm run routes-gen -- -c ./src/service-wrappers/account/tsoa.json
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run compile
scripts.compile: npm run clean && npm run api-build && tsc -p tsconfig.build.json --skipLibCheck
scripts.migrate-db: npm run build && NEW_RELIC_NO_CONFIG_FILE=true NODE_ENV=test NODE_PATH=dist node dist/migrations/index.js
scripts.build-image-account: cd ../../.. && docker build --build-arg NPM_TOKEN=$NPM_TOKEN -t $KINESIS_ECR_URL/kbe-services-account:$JIRA_IMAGE_TAG -t $KINESIS_ECR_URL/kbe-services-account:latest -f packages/services/account/src/service-wrappers/account/Dockerfile . && cd packages/services/account
scripts.build-image-salesforce: cd ../../.. && docker build --build-arg NPM_TOKEN=$NPM_TOKEN -t $KINESIS_ECR_URL/kbe-services-salesforce-reconciliation:$JIRA_IMAGE_TAG -t $KINESIS_ECR_URL/kbe-services-salesforce-reconciliation:latest -f packages/services/account/src/service-wrappers/salesforce/Dockerfile . && cd packages/services/account
scripts.build-base-image: cd ../../.. && docker build --build-arg NPM_TOKEN=$NPM_TOKEN -t $KINESIS_ECR_URL/kbe-services-account-base:latest -f packages/services/account/Dockerfile . && cd packages/services/account
scripts.build-image-latest: npm run build-base-image && npm run build-image-account && npm run build-image-salesforce
scripts.push-image: npm run push-image-account && npm run push-image-salesforce
scripts.deploy-latest-integration:account: aws ecs update-service --service kbe-int-account-service-v2 --cluster kbe-int-cluster --region ap-southeast-2
